Paragraph: We report a Japanese family with adrenoleukodystrophy ( ALD ) with a three base pair deletion ( delGAG 291 ) in the ALD gene .

2. ALD gene - This is the gene that is associated with adrenoleukodystrophy, and the paragraph mentions a specific mutation (a three base pair deletion) in this gene.
